name: Gulati Canvas
overview:
Incepted in the year 1994, we Gulati Canvas Store have established ourselves as one of the reputed manufacturers and traders of Tarpulins and Polythene Tubes in India. With our huge collection of different types of covering materials, we cater to the changing and demanding requirements of various industries in the country ensuring their product safety. We also offer our clients with impeccable packaging solutions that remove the glitches in packaging and enable them offer their products in classy as well as stylish looks.

Product Portfolio:

Tarpaulin Covering Sheets Fumigation Cover Poly Film Woven Fabric Cloth Polythene Tube Green Net Flooring Sheets HDPE Fabric Polythene Sheets Tirpal Our Brands

Our Team:

The tremendous success and growth that we enjoy in the industry is because of the dedicated efforts of our team members. Our team members possess considerable experience and domain expertise, which enables them work according to present market scenario.

Quality:

We are an ISO 9001:2008 Certified organization and work with only one thing in mind that is offering clients with unmatched quality packaging materials, tarpaulins and canvas materials. Our products are duly tested against standards by Delhi Test House. For this, we have set-up a stringent quality management system in our organizations, which is one of the key to our success.

Client Satisfaction:

We are a client-oriented organization and have directed our operations towards achieving maximum satisfaction of clients. In this endeavor, our team supports us with complete dedication and enabled us offer clients with unmatched packaging and other tenting solutions in a cost effective manner. Our personnel also ensure that these products are delivered to clients within the agreed timeline.
